solution_line_template: Horatio never got to read {unheard_lines} / {lines_per_sonnet} = <<{unheard_lines}/{lines_per_sonnet}={unheard_sonnets}>>{unheard_sonnets} sonnets.
He read his lady {read_sonnets} sonnets, so he wrote {read_sonnets} + {unheard_sonnets} = <<{read_sonnets}+{unheard_sonnets}={total_sonnets}>>{total_sonnets} sonnets in all.
